extendedInfo.description: The Roane State mobile app gives students touch-friendly access to their Momentum courses and keeps students up to date on whatâs happening at the college.Students can check course news, view course content, participate in discussions, and check their Momentum grades.  Students only need to log in to Momentum one time, and they can stay logged in, giving them quick access to their Momentum courses anytime, anywhere.The Roane State mobile app gives students touch-friendly access to their Momentum courses and keeps students up to date on whatâs happening at the college.Students can check course news, view course content, participate in discussions, and check their Momentum grades.  Students only need to log in to Momentum one time, and they can stay logged in, giving them quick access to their Momentum courses anytime, anywhere.The app also has a mobile version of RaiderNet.Additional app features include:â¢ One-touch dialing for student services phone numbers (financial aid, business office, admissions, individual campuses) and touch-friendly search for other numbersâ¢ One-touch dialing for securityâ¢ Announcements from Roane Stateâ¢ List of upcoming Roane State eventsâ¢ Map showing campus locations. Touch a location, and you can get driving directionsâ¢ Links to Roane State Facebook, Twitter, YouTube The app is designed to help students complete their coursework and to stay up to date with all the exciting opportunities they can enjoy at Roane State.
